Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: dennis borchert
Reviews.Content: This Is a great camera. took almost 2 thousand pictures with it on my vacation & had absolutely no problems

Reviews.Title: Unbelievable camera !!!!!
Reviews.Author: Denn
Reviews.Content: This camera is incredible it's user friendlyAnd nikons  guide system explains everything so u can get out of the auto settings and start using the manual modes to take advantage of this cameras full potential !!!

Reviews.Title: My wife loves it
Reviews.Author: Luke
Reviews.Content: It's was a Christmas gift for my wife. It take awesome pictures and does more that she will probably ever use. Everytime she uses it she finds a new feature that makes it better. It's probably the best gift she's ever gotten.

<1> Nikon D3200 Digital SLR Camera & 18-55mm G VR DX AF-S Zoom Lens (Red) + <2> Transcend 32GB Class10 SD Card +
<3> Nikon Digital SLR Camera Case + <4> Vivitar 52mm UV Glass Filter +
<5> PD 2.5x Tele & .45x Wide Lens + <6> Precision Design 57" Tripod + <7> PD 6pc Complete Cleaning Kit +
<8> PD Spudz Microfiber Cloth + <9> Transcend SD Memory Card Case + <10> LCD Monitor Screen Protectors
ProductInfo.Name: Nikon D3200 Digital SLR Camera & 18-55mm G VR DX AF-S Zoom Lens (Red) with 32GB Card + Case + Filter + Tripod + Telephoto & Wide-Angle Lenses + Accessory Kit
